task.title: Back Office Data Entry
task.abstract:
Staff users can purchase subscriptions on behalf of customers and fellow staff members.
Purchasing a Subscription

step.cmd: Click the New Sales Order Line button to add a Subscription Item.
Click the Direct Debit Checkout button.

ol.li: The Direct Debit enabled item will be added to its own Sales Order.
Acknowledgement page displays and can be printed or saved as a PDF to be sent to the customer

An email will be sent to provided email address (required) from the payment processorIf customer does not have an email address, the merchant must provide a valid email address for the customer to ensure that communication from the payment processor reaches the customer.

step.cmd: Follow the steps to Renew a subscription.
Click the Direct Debit Checkout button
step.info: Staff users can make updates to the customers existing Direct Debit Agreement or create a new agreement. The new agreement will take affect when the current agreement expires. A new agreement should always be created if there is a change in the payment frequency.
